apps.name: Cercube 5
apps.subtitle: YouTube with Enhanced Features
apps.localizedDescription: Get all the features of YouTube Red for free.

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
This lets you create videos using the app.
Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
This lets you upload videos you've already created.

apps.name: MediaBoxHD
apps.localizedDescription: MediaBoxHD allows you to watch almost any movie or TV show for free.

permissions.usageDescription: This allows you to connect to bluetooth devices.
This app requires access to the photo library.

apps.name: Rocket for Instagram
apps.subtitle: Instagram with Enhanced Features
apps.versionDescription: Added to Rocket to Cracked Repo.
apps.localizedDescription: Rocket for Instagram is the one and only tweak that you'll need for Instagram. Made by Instagram users for Instagram users.

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you take photos and record video.
This helps you and others find friends and more. Your contacts will be synced and securely stored on Instagram's servers.
This lets you log into Instagram using Apple Face ID.
Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content, help people find places and more. You can always change this later in your phone’s settings.
Instagram uses this to make some features work, personalize content, help people find places and more. You can always change this later in your phone’s settings
This lets you record videos with sound.
This lets you save photos and videos to your Camera Roll.

apps.name: Spotify++
apps.localizedDescription: Spotify++ allows you to stream any song you want without ads.

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
This lets you save and select images to and from your Photo Library.
Used to control your tempo for Spotify Running.
This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
This lets you use Spotify with external accessories.
This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
